titleStmt.title: A reply to a sheet of paper, intituled, The magistracy and government of England vindicated, or, A justification of the English method of proceedings against criminals, by way of answer to the defence of the late Lord Russel's innocence, &c. written by John Hawles ...
titleStmt.author: Hawles, John, Sir, 1645-1716.
